name: huma-i
0:
”Alexa, ask huma i , What about my home air quality”
”Alexa, ask huma i, What about the indoor air quality”
”Alexa, ask huma i, What about the air quality”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: huma i
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Huma-i is an indoor air quality monitor which measures carbon dioxide, volatile organic compounds, PM1.0, PM2.5, PM10, temperature, and humidity.
To get started, you will need to have a Huma-i account enabled and a Huma-i device.
It works with Android and iOS and 2.4GHz Wi-Fi is required.
With Alexa, ask “Alexa, ask Huma-i“ when running Huma-i on Alexa device.
Then, ask “What about my home air quality?”, “What about the indoor air quality?” or “What about the air quality?” to check the levels of carbon dioxide, voc, fine dust, temperature, and humidity in your room.
